text: Yɨpɨl tap okok dapɨl maket lɨpal okok, monmon tawɨl ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb. Tap yepɨs agnɨgep okok sɨbogɨl dapɨl maket lɨpal akaŋ agɨl gos awl ak nɨŋɨd, takaw anɨb ak ma agnɨgɨnɨmɨb.10.25 Ñɨn ogɨnap, bɨ ogɨnap tap yepɨs agnepal okok tap pak sɨbog ñɨl, kɨdek dad amɨl maket ak lɨpal. Pol pen anɨb agup, Binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal okok, kɨli tap yɨpɨl anɨb ak tawpal ak, nɨŋɨd gos pal ma lɨnɨgel agup. Pen kɨli tawɨl ñɨbɨl, gɨ tɨmel gobun agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨgel agup.
